original_text: And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, Thou shalt not come hither. Nevertheless David took the castle of Zion, which is the city of David.
korean_text: 여부스 원주민이 다윗에게 이르기를 네가 이리로 들어오지 못하리라 하나 다윗이 시온 산 성을 빼앗았으니 이는 다윗 성이더라

sentences.original_text: And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David
Nevertheless David took the castle of Zion
which is the city of David
